/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a concrete barrier, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. Power lines crisscross above the street, a common sight in many cities. The image is bathed in bright sunlight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
